sense.name: applied science
sense.commentary: The practical application of science to society and everyday life.
sense.examples: Modern technology is so difficult to keep up with. Before you get your new computer home the technology will be outdated.

sense.name: the discipline
sense.commentary: The study of the practical application of science to modern life.
sense.examples: I guess he's studying technology over at that new technical school. He had trouble deciding which branch of engineering to study.
